[[Center(begin)]]
== '''Hirlam HOWTOs''' ==
= '''Running HIRLAM with mini-SMS script''' =
[[Center(end)]]

== How to launch a HIRLAM experiment ==
 1. set up an experiment directory $expdir under $HOME/hl_home
{{{
   mkdir -p $HOME/hl_home/$expdir
   cd $HOME/hl_home/$expdir
}}}
 1. let $VERSION be an available HIRLAM reference model version such as 7.0 or HEAD or snowscheme, do
{{{
   Hirlam setup -r $VERSION
}}}
 1. if applicable, 'check out' some source code or script and do modification
{{{
   Hirlam co scripts/Env_domain
   Hirlam co scripts/Env_expdesc
   Hirlam co spdy/gemini_tl.F
}}}
 1. launch experiment, e.g.,
{{{
   Hirlam start DTG=2006030806 DTGEND=2006030812
}}}

== How to re-start a HIRLAM run ==
 1. cd $HOME/hl_home/$expdir
 1. verify that DTG, DTGBEG etc. are correct in progress.log and progressPP.log
 1. to check and continue or recover a production run, e.g.,
{{{
   Hirlam prod DTGEND=2006030812
}}}
 1. or, the following can also continue from cycle DTG as in progress.log 
{{{
   Hirlam continue DTGEND=2006030812
}}}
 1. or, the following can also resume an interrupted experiment at check point 
{{{
   Hirlam resume DTGEND=2006030812
}}}
